500    _a Introduction in Japanese and songs in English and
 Japanese.
500    _a Appears to be footage of a Beatles concert given on
 6/30/66 at the Nippon Budokan Hall, Tokyo, Japan; concert was
 filmed on 6/30/66 and broadcast in color by NTV (Japanese
 television) on 7/1/66, but cannot determine if ever shown by
 NBC per Fred Gilmore, Science Librarian, Univ. of Michigan
 Engineering/Transportation Library, 10/7/91; dates of 3/15/68
 and 3/18/68 appear on cans, but cannot determine to what these
 dates refer.
500    _a NBC inventory box no. 67 and 1184.

 recording history, p. 99; Lewisohn, M. The Beatles live, p.
 192, 199.
